name: HUGE BEER PONG CHALLENGES VR
description:
Sink shots against the clock.

Huge Beer Pong Challenges VR pits you against the timer, all with one objective: Sinking the most difficult beer pong shots imaginable. You will have 420 seconds in an array of environments, with scores of cup draining challenges to overcome. Damos Designs proudly presents Huge Beer Pong Challenges VR.

Key Features:
- Single Player Beer Pong Challenge Mini Games
- Curated multi-scene levels
- Contextual game mechanics
- Easter Eggs hidden throughout!
